forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: actually let people add editors to boards

comments.text: i have a board that i only want certain people to add on and i was told adding board editors is not even a feature.
would be useful for project teams to have private boards. able to share things created/altered on it between themselves.
wait - the board permissions screen specifically mentions editors, plural. if you can't add editors, then what is that referring to?

thread.latestCommentText: wait - the board permissions screen specifically mentions editors, plural. if you can't add editors, then what is that referring to?
